summary.para: Performs a parametric softplus activation function on every element in InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
Where exp(x) is the natural exponentiation function and ln(x) is the natural logarithm.
This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that the output tensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SOFTPLUS_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SOFTPLUS_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The Steepness coefficient. A typical default for this value is 1.0. This value cannot be less than 1.
